Reviews.Title: “Very Peacefull”
Reviews.Author: Vimall71
Reviews.Content: Me and family stayed here for 4D 3N. We took Deluxe Triple II room. It was spacious & just nice for my 3 young daughters . American breakfast was served daily. Good quiet place to rest after a day long walking at the Zoo/Bird Park. Bus station is 5 min walk and Newton MRT station just 15min walk from this hotel. It was a very relaxing stay with helpfull front desk staff. No charge for extra pillow/towel n rooms was cleaned daily. Its about SD20 from hotel to Changi Airport by Taxi. Good place for family with less expectation for luxury stay or standard buffet spread!

Reviews.Title: “Not VIP at all”
Reviews.Author: LudmilaT
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for nine nights and it was one of the worst hotels I’ve been to. Water in the shower was very cold (at least for Western standards), sheets and towels not very well washed and there were leaks on the ceiling. Internet is charged ( 3 Singapore dollars a day) and it stopped working for over a day. Hotel is not very close to the main tourist attractions, though it is about a 15 minute walk to a subway station.

Reviews.Title: “VIP service @ VIP hotel”
Reviews.Author: barbourella
Reviews.Content: We stayed @ VIP hotel which is in a great location within walking distance of buses to Orchard Road. The hotel is located in a quiet residential area so really peaceful. The staff were all very friendly and only to pleased to help. Our room was a really good size and was spotlessly clean with tea coffee facilities and toiletries.

Reviews.Title: “Family stay at VIP hotel, Singapore.”
Reviews.Author: ManishSahdev
Reviews.Content: We are a family of four (Two adults and two kids) and we stayed in VIP hotel from 07 to 13 Dec 11 in a Deluxe room-II. The location of the hotel is very good. Its located in a very quiet and posh residential area of Singapore. So no sleepless nights due to road traffic noise etc.The Balmoral Plaza is next to this hotel which has restaurants, multi-utility stores like 7-11 and medicine etc. The Newton MRT stn is 7 min by walk with small children and the bus stand is 4 min on the Bukit Timah road. The room was very spacious and generous. They had put an extra bed for our family which made our lives much easy. Air con was decent. Linen was sparkling clean and was changed every day along with towels etc. The carpet in the room was old and needs a change or can be done away with. The bathroom was clean and hygienic. The room had a small fridge, electric kettle with tea bags etc, an LCD TV, iron on demand and telephone. The buffet area is small and cozy. The breakfast is pretty basic but I guess if you are on holiday with a budget, its ok. The pool is next to the buffet area and comes very handy to relax after a tiring day while holidaying. The cabs are easily accessible from the reception. Some cons :- Very cold behaviour of the staff at reception. Limited drinking water (only two litres per day) and tea sachets in the rooms. Just 10-12 channels in the TV provided. No free internet. Suggestions :- Improve the breakfast, may be add some fruits etc. Provide atleast 1 lit of drinking water per individual per day . Provide increased amount of tea sachets. Provide wi-fi internet access free of cost in the rooms. Overall : Highly recommended for a family holiday where one wants to spend more on tourist attractions and less on accomodation.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: koolmusik
Reviews.Content: It's located in a residential area closed from all the mayor shopping area. Only 10min walk from NS21 Newton station, which is one stop from Orchard Rd. Room are ok. At least they've got windows. We stay in a superior double room in the 3rd floor. It was nice&quiet. Beds are comfortable. However, breakfast should be improved...very basic don't expect much.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious room but needs improvements”
Reviews.Author: freya88
Reviews.Content: +room spacious +good service +strategic location -old looking hotel -closet smelly -lack of choices for breakfast -quite expensive

Reviews.Title: “U cant ask more at this price.”
Reviews.Author: hanren1985
Reviews.Content: The very first thing i noticed when i enter the room was the a little dusty carpet. Dont really felt comfortable walking on it barefoot. And also the bathroom floor is as dusty as well. Secondly, it's the wifi. It wasnt included. So, user will need to fork out extra $3/per day/per hp. Which i think, should be included for free! Even if it's not, $3/per day (not per hp) is stil acceptable, at least for me. Other then the two things(cleanliness & wifi) mentioned, everything else is fine.

Reviews.Title: “If on Budget - this place in excellent”
Reviews.Author: ManojArora
Reviews.Content: Given the expensive choice of hotels in Singapore, I think this was just right a choice for me and my family. The room (family room) was nice and the bathroom seemed newly done up. The bedshhets were very clean and chnaged each day. The bed was very very comfortable. The hotel is in the business district and based in a very good residential area called Balmoral street. The choice we made hence was good as there is silence in the area. Taxi's and MRT are easily accessible. Choice of breakfast though is not good but not does not take away too much from the good stay it provides. Its based in close proximity from Little India so food for Indians like us is not a problem.

Reviews.Title: “Close to business district, a practical budget hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Abhava
Reviews.Content: Location is great, rooms spacious, Internet @ SGD 3 a day! Great budget hotel for a traveller. Quite a big pool to relax at the end of the day. Very basic & simple breakfast. Quite strict with checkin & check out time, but can leave luggage to pick later ...

Reviews.Title: “An Oasis in a sea of glitz and busy activity!”
Reviews.Author: datul_lamak
Reviews.Content: We've been vacationing in Singapore for over a decade, and at last found a great place to stay. Huge rooms (27 sq meters where as downtown the same priced room is only 9 !), a staff you can talk to and who did there jobs with pleasure and utter quietness at night. Situated in a upscale neighborhood on a tiny street with no through traffic, it's like you are in a cocoon of peacefulness and stability. A well established inn (since 1973, with many remodels, and now complete) run by a real innkeeper, Mr.Tan, who has designed his lodgings for his guests to like, not just endure. It feels like the sort of inns who visited in a different time, when people cared if you came back! Yes: you do have to take a cab to get to the "sights", but they are cheap and if you are young, the MRT is 10 minutes away by foot. Yes: there are a handful of restaurants ranging from the cheap and good to the fabulous and expensive, all 5 minutes away on foot, and a upscale grocers just down the way. A great pool with built-in jets to ease those aching muscles from walking all over Little India, too. All of this for the least than the cost of the windowless cubicles downtown. AND...no hidden costs or tricky fine print. We will never stay anywhere else but the VIP.

Reviews.Title: “its a nice hotel with a great value”
Reviews.Author: stayinbandung
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice, evenkind a far from mrt, ot takes 10 minutes walking to the nearest station, but overall we love this hotel. The staffs are very helpful and service is great even for bfast they serve same bfast everyday hehehe..

Reviews.Title: “cold and unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: nila99
Reviews.Content: VIP was a disappointment as it is not centrally located though around 20 mins from orchard rd. The breakfast served was unappetizing and rationed as if famine prevailed in Singapore. The card key of the room didn't function properly and one night a whole wing of the hotel was suddenly plunged into darkness as there was a short circuit somewhere in that wing. We had to leave the door open and when we inquired at the reception ,the male staff there was very rude . They did not even provide us with a candle or torch and we had to wait in the corridor for a few hours . Did not feel safe in the hotel and will never go back there. Can't pay money to see grumpy and cold faces of a hotel staff . A welcoming smile from the staff is not a financial investment from management . Fortunately stayed only 2 days there.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap for Singapore but could do with a revamp”
Reviews.Author: Marl56
Reviews.Content: This hotel was OK but nothing exceptional. It was clean but very faded round the edges and needs a revamp. The pool was out of order as it was being rebuilt and as we had booked because it had a pool that was disappointing - a bit of false advertising going on there! The first receptionist we encountered seemed very uninterested in us and more or less just pointed us to the room and let us take care of ourselves. The breakfast was very small and had little variety. We only stayed one night, I think if we had been staying longer in Singapore we would have moved elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Even if it's just a phone call it could be more polite.”
Reviews.Author: smellyjelly
Reviews.Content: Im staying in Singapore and wanted to hold a small gathering for my friends I booked a room for 2 adults at VIP hotel, because there were no other options like "for 5/6/7/8" adults So to be polite I called them to ask if I could hold a party and let my friends stay over for the night... The person on the line asked me to hold on and probably went to ask the manager The manager would be nicer not to shout THAT loud that and saying"by 12midnight ALL OUT" like thankyou very much. mood to hold party at your hotel. NONE. seriously felt that the service is gonna stink real bad there. But since ive booked ive got no choice. Room for improvement

HotelInfo.Name: VIP Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 5 Balmoral Crescent, Singapore 259895, Singapore
